result.ga: agus ar scor ar bith nach cuma
result.orig: agus ar scor ar bith nach cuma
result.html: agus ar scor ar bith nach cumaAnd anyway, does it matter?
result.ponchtml: agus ar scor ar biṫ naċ cumaAnd anyway, does it matter?

result.eng: Anyway, to make a long story short...
result.ga: cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid

result.ponchtml: cibé ar biṫ le scéal fada a ḋéanaṁ gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...

result.ga: cé tú féin ar scor ar bith

result.html: cé tú féin ar scor ar bithWho are you anyway?
result.ponchtml: cé tú féin ar scor ar biṫWho are you anyway?

result.eng: I don't do it often, anyway.
